text: @kyledcheney @davidfrum @chuckwoolery go visit a COVID-19 ward in Miami or Houston and report back about HOAX. Yes, every hospital, doctor, nurse, and healthcare worker sacrificing their lives for morons like you are making it up and doing it to hurt economy. Many of these professionals are republicans.
